template.label: Seat Naming Rules
template.description: Description of naming rules: ・{number}: Numbers incrementing from 1, e.g., 1, 2, 3... ・{alphabet}: Letters A-Z, after 26 letters continue as AA, AB, AC... ・{columnNumber}: Seat number in the current row, starting from 1, e.g., 1, 2, 3... Examples: ・{number}-{columnNumber}: Results like 1-1, 1-2, 1-3... ・{alphabet}{columnNumber}: Results like A1, ..., A26, B1, AA1, AB1...
